long_description: The ultralight and compact Tamrac ZipShot tripod is easy to carry and sets up in seconds. Say goodbye to heavy, bulky tripods that take precious time to put in place. With ZipShot , simply release the 2 red shock cords and watch the tripod legs spring open and into place. Sturdy aluminum materials and a heavy-duty metal ball head support up to 3 lbs.-suitable for a DSLR with lens, point-and-shoot camera, camcorder or flash. The Tamrac ZipShot tripod features a single release lever lets you position the mount at virtually any angle, making it easy to take portrait or landscape shots.
short_description: The ultralight and compact Tamrac ZipShot tripod is easy to carry and sets up in seconds. Say goodbye to heavy, bulky tripods that take precious time to put in place.
